messages.subject: Diversity
messages.msgSnippet: I wanted to share with you all that I have loved reading here the past couple of weeks. We have a great deal of diversity here, and I love how that is
messages.messageBody:
I wanted to share with you all that I have loved reading here the past couple
of weeks. We have a great deal of diversity here, and I love how that is
celebrated. There are relatively few places where I feel so comfortable
sharing details of my family's life, and find that rather than just being
tolerated, it is honored. I also appreciate a place where we can talk about
our struggles with racism and other isms, and find ways to be with our kids
so they will have a few less layers of this stuff to deal with.

You are good people, and I am glad you're out there. Consider that you have a
friend near Boston if you want to visit.

Kathryn, who's been mushy lately


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
